title: On the generic degree of two-parameter period mappings
abstract:
We present a method for computing the generic degree of a period map defined
on a quasi-projective surface. As an application, we explicitly compute the
generic degree of three period maps underlying families of Calabi-Yau 3-folds
coming from toric hypersurfaces. As a consequence, we show that the generic
Torelli theorem holds for these cases.
